original_text: And through a window in a basket was I let down by the wall, and escaped his hands.
korean_text: 나는 광주리를 타고 들창문으로 성벽을 내려가 그 손에서 벗어났노라

sentences.original_text: And through a window in a basket
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 창문을 통해 바구니 안에 있어

sentences.original_text: was I let down by the wall
